game.title: Mineclonia

long_description:
# mcl_chameleon_creeper

Adapts the color of the mineclonia creeper to the grass color of the biome it currently resides in.

After an idea from @erlehmann

## Options
By default creepers will simply be tinted according to the grass color of the biome they are in.

For advanced difficulty, if you enable the "Super Chameleon Creeper" setting they will be colored using the texture of the node they are standing on.

## Media Credits
 * Creeper texture desaturated mineclonia creeper texture which in turn comes from PixelPerfection TexturePack (https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture_pack/131pixel-perfection/)
name: mcl_chameleon_creeper
short_description: Creeper adapts color to the biome it is currently in
title: Mineclonia Chameleon Creeper
